description: Request for Proposal for Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment, *Variations or combinations of the above methods
full_summary:
### Constant Systems Cell Disrupter Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Number: WS3807895504
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Publication Date: January 13, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
#### Amendment Date: February 2, 2023
#### Contract Expected Start Date: None
#### Contract Expected End Date: June 30, 2023
#### Tender Status: Expired

#### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC), invites proposals for the procurement of a Constant Systems Cell Disrupter.

**Classification**
* UNSPSC: 41000000 (Laboratory and Measuring and Observing and Testing Equipment)
* Category: General Directorate (GD)

**Tender Method**
* Competitive – Open bidding

**Selection Criteria**
* Variations or combinations of the above methods

**Trade Agreements**
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Delivery**
* London

#### Key Contact Information
* Name: Denton, Crystal (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:crystal.denton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

#### Additional Information
For more information, please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15125713?extsite=MTUxMjU3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
